document_data.name: ''Ironhand's Reckoning''
document_data.mainbody: '''''Ironhand's Reckoning''''' was an enchanted [[greatsword]] from the [[Moonshae Isles]].{{Cite dungeon/196/Backdrop: The Moonshae Isles|11}}
document_data.Powers: The greatsword was enchanted to help the wielder strike and harm any kind of [[giant]]. The rumbling pain of slain giants could be heard when holding this weapon.
document_data.Notable Owners: [[Thelgaar Ironhand]], King of [[Oman]] during the 14{{th}} century [[DR]], wielded ''Ironhand's Reckoning''. The sword was believed to be buried with him in his [[Cairn of Thelgaar Ironhand|cairn]] within the [[Old Stone Wood]] on [[Oman's Isle]].
document_data.Rumors & Legends: Replicas of this weapon were crafted by the same blacksmith who forged the original, but none were as powerful as ''Ironhand's Reckoning''. The replicas were given to Helgaar's loyal followers.
